input.sentences: the flower girl was so cute
the brides father walked her down the isle
the bride and groom sat and waited to kiss
the groom and his best man posed for pictures
the couple got married on the ocean
output.sentences: The bride was pretty but I couldn't help noticing the cute flower girl.
My attention shifted as the bride and her father walked down the isle.
We all sat and waited for the momment when the priest would say, "you may now kiss the bride".
After the wedding the groom posed for pictures with his bros outside.
The married couple shared one more kiss by the ocean before they took off for their honeymoon.
